name: Jar of Red Fluid
description:
You have awoken in a strange room. Explore and see if you can discover the secret hiding somewhere, a secret so deadly that you must not fail to find it!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

This was going to be my submission for my first itch.io game jam with a theme of "conspiracy theories" and inspired by games like Myst. Unfortunately, due to the lengthy upload time on here, I was unable to complete my itch.io publishing in order to submit in time.  I decided to keep working on it for a few hours and see if I could finish. I figure this should be a good test as the game jam itself ran for 3 days but I did not notice it until I only had about 7 hours remaining to submit.  This is about 13-14 hours of work.
